        ..
        :: Release Notes:
        ::
        ::  Rave on with this 2008 import of Purely Buddy Holly who was
        ::  an American singer-songwriter and a pioneer of rock and roll.
        ::  Although his success lasted only a year and a half before his
        ::  death in an airplane crash, Holly&#039;s works and innovations
        ::  were copied by his contemporaries and later musicians,
        ::  notably The Beatles and The Rolling Stones, and exerted a
        ::  profound influence on popular music. In 2004, Rolling Stone
        ::  Magazine ranked Holly #13 on their list of the 100 Greatest
        ::  Artists of All Time. Buddy Holly&#039;s music did not die with
        ::  him. He had recorded so prolifically that his record label
        ::  was able to release brand-new Buddy Holly albums and singles
        ::  for 10 years after his death. Holly&#039;s simple demonstration
        ::  recordings were overdubbed by studio musicians, to bring them
        ::  up to then-commercial standards.
        ::
